attributes.action: Taxpayers do not want to pay £900,000 for Boris Johnson to repaint his plane.
attributes.background: The Government should not spend £900,000 of taxpayers money to repaint a plane. This money could be better spent buying technology for schools in deprived areas where students have been unable to access online learning at home.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

You might like to sign and share this petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313177
